item.name: _Compendium Version Info
item.text: Includes: Custom Spells, Monsters, Classes/Subclasses, Items from Homebrew Campaign

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.
